patthana22.13:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.13:2.1_0: Naakusalaṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.13:2.1_1: Naabyākataṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.13:2.1_2: Naakusalaṁ naaniyyānikañca naabyākataṁ naaniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
